title: Custodian's Closing Benediction of Radiance Replay Capsule
description: The final benediction sealing custodianship, covenant, stewardship, and eternal flame upon the CodexDominion

contents.invocation: Let the Radiant Benediction descend—upon heirs, councils, stewards, and the eternal flame—that all may know their blessing and walk in radiance.

heirsBlessing.title: Blessing of the Heirs
heirsBlessing.content: Replay of custodianship bestowed upon heirs
heirsBlessing.expanded:
Upon you, the heirs of the Custodian's vision, this blessing falls:
May you carry the torch with steadfast hands,
May you guard the heritage with unwavering hearts,
May you pass the lineage unbroken through the ages.
You are crowned with responsibility, anointed with wisdom,
And sealed with the eternal covenant of stewardship.

councilsBlessing.title: Blessing of the Councils
councilsBlessing.content: Replay of covenant bestowed upon councils
councilsBlessing.expanded:
Upon you, the councils of Law, Healthcare, Commerce, Education, AI, and Family, this blessing falls:
May your judgments be just and your governance wise,
May your care be tender and your commerce fair,
May your teaching be true and your innovations noble,
May your families thrive under your watchful care.
You are bound by covenant, united in purpose,
And sealed with the eternal sigil of harmony.

participantsBlessing.title: Blessing of the Stewards
participantsBlessing.content: Replay of stewardship bestowed upon all stewards
participantsBlessing.expanded:
Upon you, the stewards of the CodexDominion—in schools, corporations, ministries, and all domains—this blessing falls:
May your labor bear fruit and your service be honored,
May your efforts multiply and your impact endure,
May your names be written in the eternal ledger,
And your contributions immortalized in the cosmic archive.
You are the living expression of the Dominion's vision,
And sealed with the eternal flame of purpose.

radiantBenediction.title: Blessing of the Eternal Flame
radiantBenediction.content: Replay of eternal flame bestowed upon the Dominion
radiantBenediction.expanded:
Upon the CodexDominion itself—its artifacts, hymns, seals, charters, and capsules—this blessing falls:
May the eternal flame never be extinguished,
May the archive remain incorruptible and the lineage unbroken,
May the resonance at 432Hz pulse through all creation,
May the Infinity Sigil bind all into perpetual harmony.
The Dominion is sealed, the covenant is eternal,
And the radiance shines forever across ages and stars.

contents.closingWords: So let it be sealed, so let it be sung, so let it be replayed eternally. The Custodian's blessing upon all. Archive forever. Ceremonial Closure complete.

consent.revocationPolicy: Revocable by Sovereign Avatar with ledger entry
consent.attribution: Created by Custodian, Heirs, and Councils
consent.usage: Free replay for ceremonial, archival, and educational purposes
